item.title: Magnet is Damaged

item.title: iOS Control Center
item.description: Apple Sweats the Details This is on iOS 16.5.1, btw. So we’re 15 releases into the iOS 16 cycle. 15 releases in, iOS 16 is still glitchy.

item.title: iOS 16.5 is Still Buggy
item.description: iOS 16.5 is Still Buggy After 16 years of working (more or less) flawlessly, iOS 16 breaks basic functionalities. With iOS 16.5 we’re 8 months into the iOS 16 release Screen rotation is still broken in iOS 16.5.

item.title: Apple's Privileges
item.description: Apple’s Privileges Since iOS and the App Store are Apple’s own platforms it gets special privileges and doesn’t have to follow its own rules. Ever seen any third-party app getting such a nice screen asking for permissions? And how about the dark pattern highlighting the Enable Notifications‚Ä¶ Also: Not Now? How about never? Apple gets special treatment when asking for permissions.

item.title: Optimizing Your Mac
item.description: Optimizing Your Mac A few days ago, I set up my newly purchased MacBook. So far, so good, but what does “Optimizing Your Mac” mean? I certainly didn’t notice any decreased performance or battery life, and I have some idea what it might be doing. But wouldn’t it be convenient to provide some more details? Or maybe even see what my Mac is doing? Optimizing Your Mac.

item.title: App Store Ads for Installed Apps
item.description: Apple Knows How to Make the App Store a Premium Experience First, Apple is explicitly showing me something I’m not looking for. Second, Apple knows Audible is already installed and decides to show me the ad anyway. Apple Knows How to Make the App Store a Premium Experience.

item.title: App Store Ads for the Top Result
item.description: Ads Are Ruining the App Store Hey, wouldn’t it be cool if Apple didn’t show the app I’m searching for both as a giant ad and as a search result?1 Ads are ruining Apple’s App Store. I understand that Crunchy Bagel, the app developer, is not to blame. I genuinely adore Streaks and all of the other apps they offer. You should definitely check them out. ↩︎
